Class DAOJdbcStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.bsu.kisel.dao.jdbc.DAOJdbc
      • by.bsu.kisel.dao.jdbc.DAOJdbcStatement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDAOStatement

    @Component(value="DAOJdbcStatement")
public class DAOJdbcStatement
extends DAOJdbc
implements IDAOStatement
    This class implements DAO Statement logic with the help of JDBC.
    Author:
    Anastasiya Kisel
